course_description: Introduction to the concepts, principles, and procedures underlying assurance and financial statement auditing, with an emphasis on the revenue cycle. Topics include the auditing environment, audit planning, materiality, risk assessment, evidence and documentations, internal controls, audit sampling, auditing the revenue cycle, audit reports, professional conduct, and legal liability.
schedule_location: TTh 8:30am-9:45am in Goizueta Foundation Ctr W330
